Good Comments: Microscopic text size, nonexistent padding, uses the subpar Ayako subs without any editing or corrections. Previews missing. At least there's some adequate song and text translations.
Grammatical errors, direct word translations instead of forming coherent sentences. Also changed Oppama base to Obama base. A bunch of weird things like that.
Grammatical errors everywhere. More than any other fansub group I've seen in a long time.
Bad Comments: Episodes are on usenet instead of torrent. This makes finding the episodes easier.
ESL subs. And they understand Japanese about as well as they understand English.
